author: इंदुलेखा अरविंद
title: In Kerala, we have kept over 1.2 lakh beds ready: KK Shailaja, state health minister
description: Kerala was on alert as soon as reports of a new kind of coronavirus in Wuhan surfaced and the state established a control room as early as January 24, revealed Shailaja. She further said that it was the state's experience with other  infectious diseases like …
content:
Kerala Health Minister 
KK Shailaja, better known as Shailaja Teacher, has been praised for the way in which she has been leading the state’s response to the Covid-19 pandemic. In an interview with 
Indulekha Aravind, she talks about the factors that helped… [+6016 chars]
